Closes BufferedReader instance or BufferedWriter instance if open.

F

Returns true if a file at that path exists, false otherwise.

Checks if two files are equal by matching their checksums.
filesEqualIgnoreName(File, File) - Static method in class OFile
Checks if two files are equal by matching their checksums, disregarding their file names.

R

Renames this file given a newName.
renameTo(File) - Method in class OFile
Deprecated.
Does not create new OFile instance, so getPath and others be outdated. Use renameToFile(java.io.File) instead.
renameToFile(File) - Method in class OFile
Renames this file given a new file.
